quoteText: webSaver.ca may disclose information from the Site to any third party including law enforcement agencies to protect its rights and property in response to legal process, or in a good faith belief that disclosure is justified or required, or in an emergency situation.
title: personal data is given to third parties

tosdr.case: Your personal data is given to third parties
tosdr.tldr: They can share any data in "good faith" that it is required.
